message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! With 1 out of 2 products being high-quality, the odds are in your favor. Trust me, this one is a gem! It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag. Take a chance and make a great purchase today!
I'm willing to take a chance and buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'm only willing to pay $50 for it, considering the 50% chance of it being low-quality.

This high-quality product is truly exceptional, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a slight discount to $75. It's a steal at this price! What do you say?

I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice, but I'm still hesitant to commit to buying without more information. I'd like to know more about the overall quality of the products you're offering. Can you share the proportion of high-quality products sold so far?

I completely understand your concerns! I'm happy to share that out of the 2 products I've sold so far, 1 was high-quality. That's a 50% success rate, just like the overall probability. If you're still unsure, I can offer a unique deal: if this product turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and a personalized recommendation for a future high-quality product.
